Title: The Badger
Writer: Bill Dubuque (created by), Paul Kolsby, Mark Williams (created by), Ning Zhou (staff writer), Martin Zimmerman
Actors: Jason Bateman, Laura Linney, Sofia Hublitz, Skylar Gaertner
Plot: Marty finds a way around the Snells. Charlotte hires a lawyer. The Byrdes get a meeting with the gaming commission, whose approval comes with a big ask.
